name: Solar System Project (Jem557)
description:
1. Added the remaining planets with a default whooshing sound (Inaudible on most planets due to distance) as well as increased the scale of the sun:
    • Venus
    • Mercury
    • Mars
    • Jupiter
    • Saturn
    • Uranus
    • Neptune
  2. Expanded the cameras to encompass all of the planets and changed the color on the minimap to be able to more properly see them.
  3. Moved the Comet Spawner to reflect changes in camera and size change of the sun
  4. Added Banana.
    1. Spawner for the banana
    2. Sound effect for the banana

The banana was added to provide the solarsystem with some much needed potassium. Also because I just had the model sitting around after practicing 3d modeling a few months ago. Good use I think.  

I've adjusted the brightness to be able to more clearly see the textures of the planets for sake of clarity in the project.

Game Assembled by: Jonathan Martin (Me) 

Banana Assets (as well as default planet audio) created by: Jonathan Martin (Me) 

All other assets provided by the course.
